name: unrestored
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something old is unrestored, it has not been returned to an earlier better condition: an unrestored medieval fortress This car is unrestored and in original 1964 condition. Related word
restore
More examplesFewer examplesThe painting has remained unrestored and in storage since the Revolution. This is a rare example of an unrestored original homestead. There is also the chance to see down into the unrestored courtyards of mansions not yet converted into hotels.If you walk far enough west, you come upon unrestored sections of the wall at the edge of the Gobi Desert.
